Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Code formatting: ESLint + Prettier + Airbnb style integration

Applied professional code formatting with Prettier and resolved all ESLint errors.

Changes:
- Added Prettier 3.x with Airbnb-compatible configuration
- Integrated eslint-config-prettier to prevent rule conflicts
- Added missing globals (queueMicrotask, MGA_saveJSON, MGA_loadJSON)
- Auto-formatted entire codebase with Prettier
- Reconciled ESLint/Prettier formatting differences

Results:
- 0 ESLint errors (down from 12)
- 156 warnings (safe style preferences)
- Syntax validation: PASSED
- No breaking changes

Config files:
- package.json: Added Prettier dependencies
- .prettierrc: Airbnb-style formatting rules
- .prettierignore: Exclude node_modules, dist, backups
- eslint.config.mjs: Added Prettier integration + missing globals

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
